name: ShortcodeGPT
author: Daniel Morris

sections.description:
ShortcodeGPT is the ultimate content creation tool for website developers, content creators, and small business owners. Our plugin is designed to help you save time and effort by automating the content creation process, so you can focus on what matters most – growing your business.

With ShortcodeGPT, you can:

Generate catchy captions, compelling product descriptions, and attention-grabbing headlines
Optimize your content for SEO and drive more traffic to your site
Create engaging social media content that attracts and retains your audience
Craft subject lines and email content that increase open rates and conversions
Choose from three different service plans tailored to your content creation needs
ShortcodeGPT is easy to use, even if you have no prior experience with AI or automation tools. Our plugin includes comprehensive documentation and responsive support to help you get the most out of your investment.
sections.installation:
Upload the shortcodegpt folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
Go to Settings>ChatGPT Settings and enter your OpenAI / ChatGPT API Key.
You can also opt to have us host your API key and Do It For You.
Visit our website for use demonstrations.
Use the ShortcodeGPT interface to generate high-quality content effortlessly
sections.faq:
Q: How does ShortcodeGPT work?
A: ShortcodeGPT uses AI-driven tools and automation to help you create high-quality, engaging content with ease. Simply input your content and preferences, and ShortcodeGPT will generate a variety of options for you to choose from.

Q: What types of content can I create with ShortcodeGPT?
A: ShortcodeGPT can be used to create a wide range of content, including social media posts, email campaigns, blog posts, product descriptions, and more.

Q: Do I need any prior experience with AI or automation tools to use ShortcodeGPT?
A: No, ShortcodeGPT is designed to be easy to use, even for beginners. Our plugin includes comprehensive documentation and responsive support to help you get the most out of your investment.
sections.changelog:
3.1 – 4/24/2023

Improved security and validation features
3.0 – 3/12/2023

Added support for new content types
Improved AI models and accuracy
